title: Train fault causing delays on North-South Line

title_translations.zh-Hans: 列车故障导致南北线延误
title_translations.ms: Kerosakan kereta api menyebabkan kelewatan di Laluan Utara-Selatan
title_translations.ta: வடக்கு-தெற்கு பாதையில் தாமதத்தை ஏற்படுத்தும் ரயில் கோளாறு

updates.text: Delays and stalled trains this morning between Kranji and Woodlands stations likely to be caused by lightning.
[NSL] CLEARED: Train services between #JurongEast and #Sembawang are now operating normally.Trains and platforms are crowded.
[NSL]: Estimate 15 mins additional travelling time between #Woodlands and #AngMoKio due to train fault.
